itemDescription: British writer, model and member of the Bloomsbury Group

wikipedia_page.main: Mary Barnes Hutchinson (29 March 1889 – 17 April 1977) was a British short-story writer, socialite, model and a member of the Bloomsbury Group.

response: Among her other notable affairs were Sibyl Colefax, Lady Ottoline Morrell and others. Mary Hutchinson and Virginia had an intimate friendship. Some surmise that she may have fallen in love with Madge Symonds, the wife of one of her uncles. She also fell in love with Violet Dickinson although there is some confusion as to whether the two consummated their relationship.
*Mary Hutchinson, wife of poet William Wordsworth

link_mentions.page: Mary Hutchinson (member of the Bloomsbury Group)
